title: Skript插件不知道为什么出现**
author: xx578975893
txt_content:
[23:29:29] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 8/INFO]: [0;37;22m[[0;33;22mSkript[0;37;22m][m [0;31;22mThere was an error checking for the latest version of Skript:[0;31;1m Cannot connect to api.github.com[m

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content: 检查更新失败了，请在插件配置中找到update字样的设置，将true改为false

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
你不会是在内网测试服务器吧 

连 api.github.com 都连接不上

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
